ComicInfo.Summary:
As Clay and the crew try to track down the Biker with No Name before he blows up their tenuous drug deal, Jax and Opie go to the One-Niners to find out about SAMCRO’s missing guns in an attempt to get back in Clay’s good graces.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Brahm Revel | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Denis Medri | 2 |
